dmca.title: Mir Internet Marketing Claims Copyright Infringement (#15)
dmca.body:
Mir Internet Marketing, Inc.
[private]
Chicago, Illinois 60607

December 17, 2003

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Google Customer Support Professionals,

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on
   http://www.seologic.com/placement/

   Search Query: "build or rehabilitate your web site"
   Infringing Web Pages: 
   http://www.google.com/search?sourceid=navclient&ie=UTF- 8&oe=UTF-8&q=%22build+or+rehabilitate+your+web+site%22

Result #1: Search Engine Optimisation, positioning, placement - We can re-build or rehabilitate your web site so that it delivers the exact information and resources that your potential customers are seeking...www.toprankingwebsite-promotion.com/Info/infolys.html - 7k - Cached - Similar pages

When you click on the link, you are taken to a page which includes an exact copy of my work, but the page uses a JavaScript redirect to forward the user to a page without a copy

2. My Contact Information: [private]@internetmadeeasy.com

3. Infringer's Contact Information - [private]@topranking-website-promotion.com

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

[private], CEO 
Mir Internet marketing, Inc.
